sentences.english: This grave matron had several sorts of practice.
sentences.chinese: 這位假正經的婦人有好幾種慣做的事情。

sentences.english: The old lady fusses over her little dog as if it were a sick child.
sentences.chinese: 老婦人照顧她的小狗，猶如照顧她生病的孩子。

sentences.english: Better to live in a desert than with a quarrelsome and ill-tempered wife.
sentences.chinese: 寧可住在曠野，不與爭吵使氣的婦人同住。

sentences.english: The old woman a maid servant to clean her house.
sentences.chinese: 老婦人僱傭了一個暖和的僕人去洗她的馬。

sentences.english: And the Philistines came up, and burnt her and her father with fire.
sentences.chinese: 於是非利士人上去，用火燒了婦人和她的父親。

sentences.english: And the king said unto her, What aileth thee?
sentences.chinese: 王問婦人說，你有什麼苦處。

sentences.english: The woman wiped away her tears and listened to Katyayana carefully.
sentences.chinese: 婦人把眼淚擦拭一下，望着迦旃延。

sentences.english: He settles the barren woman in her home as a happy mother of children.
sentences.chinese: 他使不能生育的婦人安居家中，爲多子的樂母。

sentences.english: The old lady has practised a lot at drawing and she is now a famous painter.
sentences.chinese: 這位老婦人刻苦練習繪畫，她現在是一名著名畫家了。

sentences.english: The old woman, hearing Clemencia's voice, went back to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 老婦人，聽克萊門的聲音，回去睡覺。

sentences.english: The old woman slumped in the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 那個老婦人團坐在沙發上。

sentences.english: But he said unto her, Thou speakest as one of the foolish women speaketh.
sentences.chinese: 約伯卻對她說，你說話像愚頑的婦人一樣。

sentences.english: And she shall then continue in the blood of her purifying three and thirty days;
sentences.chinese: 婦人在產血不潔之中，要家居三十三天。

sentences.english: The old woman sighed out her grief.
sentences.chinese: 老婦人嘆着氣敘說她的悲哀。

sentences.english: It is a virgin looking like a woman.
sentences.chinese: 那是一個以婦人的神情望人的處子。

sentences.english: After this he loved a woman in the Valley of Sorek, whose name was Delilah.
sentences.chinese: 後來，參孫在梭烈谷喜愛一個婦人，名叫大利拉。

definition: to report a case to the authorities
to sound an alarm/to report sth to the police
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
nothing other than/to differ in no way from/the same as/to amount to
